title: Sion's Pre-Death Skin, yeah?
body:
So, the title says it all. Wouldn't it be great if we could get the pre-death Sion skin, don't know about you fellas but honestly, I'd like to see that.  Concept art of Sion's pre-death head looks pretty neat, along with a massive sculpture that we had in "Reborn" that represents his living state. Anyways, would be cool if you guys could support this idea by commenting or something, just so we could get Riot's attention. Regardless, would love to hear other people's thoughts!


____
An update! Being a bit late with this but.. better late than never, right?
We got a couple of answers from the Q&A that was held a few days ago!

IronStylus's answer http://puu.sh/bUigI/8ee51ab190.png
Fruity's answer http://puu.sh/bUmfL/97d4c71526.png

Nothing got confirmed really, but it's nice knowing that they like it too.


____
Last "update" of sorts.

Well it saddens me that whole two years have passed since I've posted this and no concrete statement has been made. All I can do is hope that someone, somewhere at Riot's headquarters is still thinking of this and is nudging their co-workers with the idea. I haven't forgotten about it and I hope those of you that did support it, back then, haven't either.
Hopefully we do get this skin sometime in the near future.

In my mind I can't see much reason for this not to be done. The idea is great. The only reason I could think of is if the skin would become too indestinctive from his Barbarian Sion skin.

I think the idea is pretty good, i would also love to see the this skin in the game. Thumbs up for SXE63 :D
{{champion:14}}
ARNOLD VOICE PLS

Come to think of it, they'd also have to change the running/walking animation a bit, the way he runs and walks at the moment is because of his missing leg, I'd imagine a fully rested/healthy Sion to run differently.

Not only that, but if we wanted something like a good look at his beard, we'd need a bit of an adjustment on his face since he has that jaw now.

I feel like those changes alone would require this skin to be one of the highest-priced ones, so we may as well go all-out on it while we're here. Let's make it so that when this version activates its passive, he turns green and his axe glows red in homage to original Sion (play on words since a living Sion is "the original version of him" while also having his first undead appearance count as "the original version of him"). I imagine there's going to need some additional voice work as well, as a Sion that isn't dead may not have a reason to say the same things an undead person would say, let alone that I imagine an undead would sound differently than they did when they were alive.

When it comes to the jaw thing, take a look at the Barbarian skin, that one has a decent looking beard. I think it wouldn't be much of a hassle for Riot to work around the metal thing on his jaw/neck.

And I agree about the voice acting and his lines, though I wouldn't mind them leaving that as it is, just saying.

Edit: New VO would be needed.
